name: Run From Them! Beta1.0
description:
Hello there, this is our first game, but due to problems in the team, we had to leave this game indefinitely, and it is still very raw and unfinished, we apologize for this, but while we will be working on another game, so look forward to returning to this one!
Run From Them is game in which you play as archaeologis who went to the desert with his team, but it turned out that there are a lot of zombies and his whole team was eaten by zombies, you have to fight off the zombies for as long as possible, you can choose 4 types of weapons:

1. Shovel - A strong weapon that hits quickly but close

2. Pistol - a standard weapon that has normal strength and speed but with a scope

3.Automatic - Fast but weak weapon

4. Winchester - Slow but very strong weapon

Survive as long as possible in this wild zombie filled wilderness

Sorry for so bad first game, we will remake it if you'll like it but, remember: We trying for You
If you want to contact with us type to our mail: tfy.inc12@gmail.com
